FILE: cm390713v11.0.txt
DYAD: DENMARK - TAIWAN
RIVALRY: RIV1046
DISPUTE(S): MID3204 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180805
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180805

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3204 

TERRMID: MID3204 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3204 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3204 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3204 3 -- uncertain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3204 coded third party link to territorial MID because the China-Taiwan dispute serves as the underlying impetus for this MID, and that dispute is territorial in nature and outside this dyad. See CIVWARMID-NOTES. Coded uncertain because GML recommend the case be dropped since Denmark did not protest. 

MARITMID: MID3204 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3204 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: Although Taiwan seized a Danish freighter, the two states do not dispute a maritime border at this time.

ISLMID: MID3204 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3204 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3204 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3204 3 -- uncertain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID3204 from Gibler, Miller, and Little 2016, Chinese nationalists in Taiwan seized a Danish freighter because it was trading with China. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to the China-Taiwan dispute which is civil war in nature,and Taiwan is within this dyad. Coded uncertain because GML recommend the case be dropped since Denmark did not protest. 

CIVWARLINK: MID3204 1 -- civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3204 3 -- uncertain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID3204 Coded civil war link because this involves the China-Taiwan dispute, which contains a civil war dimension, and China is outside this dyad. Coded uncertain because GML recommend the case be dropped since Denmark did not protest. 

COUPMID: MID3204 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3204 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3204 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3204 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: 
Gibler, D. M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
